283:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān janapadacaryāṃ caramāṇo'nupūrveṇa yena vaiśālīṃ (lī)
283:7: tatra khalu bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati sma vādyasvaravṛkṣamūle mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamaṣṭabhirbikṣusahasraiḥ ṣaṭ-triṃśadbhiśca bodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ rājāmātyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatisaṃhatyā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaparṣadā ca parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma |
283:8: atha khalu mañjuśrīrdharmarājaputro buddhānubhāvenotthāyāsanādekaṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-deśayatu bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāmāni,
283:10: vayaṃ śrutvā sarvakarmāvaraṇāni viśodhayema paścime kāle paścime samaye saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne sattvānāmanugrahamupādāya |
283:11: atha bhagavān mañjuśriye kumārabhūtāya sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
283:14: nānākarmāvaraṇenāvṛtānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca hitārthāya |
283:16: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye |
283:20: asti mañjuśrīḥ pūrvasmin digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrād daśagaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya vaidūryanirbhāsā nāma lokadhātuḥ |
283:21: tatra bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabho nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho viharati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiśca śāstā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
283:22: tasya khaku punarmañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carata imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānānyabhūvan |
283:25: tadā mama śarīraprabhayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇā lokadhātavo bhrājeraṃstapyeran viroceran |
283:30: tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me kāyaḥ anarghavaidūryamaṇiriva antarbahiratyantapariśuddho vimalaprabhāsaṃpannaḥ syāt |
283:31: vipulakāyastadupamena śriyā tejasā ca pratyupasthitaḥ syāt |
283:32: tasyāṃśujālāni raviśaśikarānatikrameyuḥ te ca ye kecit sattvā lokadhātau jātāśca,
283:35: sarvadikṣu mama ābhayāṃ spṛṣṭāḥ kuśalāni ca)
283:37: tṛtīyaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate------tadā bodhiprātptasya ca me ye sattvā aprameyaprajñopāyabalādhānena aparimāṇasya sattvadhātorakṣayāyopabhogāya paribhogāya syuḥ |
283:38: kasyaci(t) sattvasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ na syāt ||
283:39: caturthaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāpto'haṃ ye kumārgapratipannāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakamārgapratipannāḥ pratyekabuddhamārgapratipannāśca,
283:40: te sattvā anuttare bodhimārge mahāyāne niyojayeran ||
283:41: pañcamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā mama śāsane brahmacaryaṃ careyuḥ,
283:44: śīlavipannasya mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā kvacid durgatigamanaṃ syāt ||
283:45: ṣaṣṭhaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā hīnakāyā vikalendriyā durvarṇā jaḍaiḍamūkā laṃgāḥ kubjāḥ śvitrāḥ kuṇḍā andhā badhirā unmattā ye cānye śarīrasthavyādhayaḥ,
283:46: te mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā sarve sakalendriyāḥ suparipūrṇagātrā bhaveyuḥ ||
283:47: saptamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāḥ sattvā atrāṇā aśaraṇā bhaiṣajyopakaraṇavirahitā anāthā daridrā duḥkhitāḥ, sace(t)
283:51: aṣṭamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā yaḥ kaścinmātṛgrāmo nānāśtrīdoṣaśataiḥ saṃlkiṣṭaṃ strībhāvaṃ vijugupsitaṃ mātṛgrāmayoniṃ ca parimoktukāmo mama nāmadheyaṃ dhārayet,
283:52: tasya mātṛgrāmasya na strībhāvo bhavet yāva bodhiparyavasānam ||
283:53: navamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāpte'haṃ sarvasattvān mārapāśabandhanabaddhān nānādṛṣṭigahanasaṃkaṭaprāptān sarvamārapāśadṛṣṭigatibhyo vinivartya samyagdṛṣṭau niyojya ānupūrvyeṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ saṃdarśayeyam ||
283:54: daśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūta--yadāhamanāgate--- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā rājādhibhayabhītāḥ,
283:55: ye vā bandhanabaddhāvaruddhāḥ vadhārhā anekamāyābhirupadrutā vimānitāśca kāyikavācikacaitasikaduḥkhairabhyāhatāḥ,
283:56: te mama nāmadheyasya śravaṇena madīyena puṇyānubhāvena ca sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ parimucyeran ||
283:57: ekādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūta-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvāḥ kṣudhāgninā prajvalitāḥ āhārapānaparyeṣṭyabhiyuktāḥ tannidānaṃ pāpaṃ kurvanti, sace(t)
283:59: ahaṃ teṣāṃ varṇagandharasopetena āhāreṇa śarīraṃ saṃtarpayeyam ||
283:60: dvādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate--- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā vasanavirahitā daridrāḥ śītoṣṇadaṃśamaśakrairupadrutā rātriṃdivaṃ duḥkhamanubhavanti, sace(t)
283:65: imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāni mañjuśrīḥ bhagavān bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caran kṛtavān ||
283:66: tasya khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya yat praṇidhānaṃ yacca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ tanna śakyaṃ kalpena vā kalpāvaśeṣeṇa vā kṣapayitum |
283:70: tatra vaidūryanirbhāsāyāṃ lokadhātau dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau teṣāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pramukhau,
283:73: yau tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya saddharmakośaṃ dhārayataḥ |
283:74: tasmāt tarhi mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetropapattaye praṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam ||
283:75: punaraparaṃ bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma-santi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthagjanāḥ sattvāḥ,
283:77: te lobhābhibhūtā ajānanto dānaṃ dānasya ca mahāvipākam,
283:79: na ca dānasaṃvibhāge teṣāṃ cittaṃ kramate |
283:80: dānakāle upasthite svaśarīramaṃsacchedane iva vā manaso (duḥkhaṃ) bhavati |
283:81: aneke ca sattvāḥ ye svayameva na paribhuñjanti,
283:85: te tādṛśāḥ sattvā itaścyutvā pretaloke upapatsyante tiryagyonau vā |
283:86: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam,
283:87: tatra teṣāṃ yamalokasthitānāṃ tiryagyonisthitānāṃ vā tasya tathāgatasya nāma su(saṃ?)
283:89: saha smaraṇamātreṇa ataścyutvā punarapi manuṣyaloke upapatsyante,
283:91: te te durgatibhayabhītā na bhūyaḥ kāmaguṇebhirarthikā bhaviṣyanti,
283:96: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye tathāgatānuddiśya śikṣāpadāni dhārayanti,
283:109: tatra yaistasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyanti,
283:110: teṣāṃ tatra narake sthitānāṃ buddhānubhāvena tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ sumukhībhaviṣyati |
283:111: te tataścyutvā punarapi manuṣyaloke upapatsyante samyagdṛṣṭisaṃpannā vīryavantaḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ |
283:112: te gṛhānutsṛjya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitvā ānupūrveṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti ||
283:113: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye ātmano varṇaṃ bhāṣante matsariṇaḥ,
283:115: ātmotkarṣakaparapaṃsakāḥ sattvāḥ parasparasatkṛtvāḥ tryapāyeṣu bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi duḥkhamanubhaviṣyanti |
283:116: te anekavarṣasahasrāṇāmatyayena tataścyutvā gavāśvoṣṭragardabhādiṣu tiryagyoniṣu upapadyante |
283:117: kaśādaṇḍaprahāreṇa tāḍitāḥ kṣuttarṣapīḍitaśarīrā mahāntaṃ bhāraṃ vahamānā mārgaṃ gacchanti |
283:121: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtaistasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
283:128: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye paiśunyābhiratāḥ sattvānāṃ parasparaṃ kalahavigrahavivādān kārāpayanti |
283:129: te parasparaṃ vigrahacittāḥ sattvā nānāvidhamakuśalamabhisaṃskurvanti kāyena vācā manasā,
283:131: te ca vanadevatāmāvāhayanti vṛkṣadevatāṃ giridevatāṃ ca |
283:135: tasya śatrornāma vā śarīrapratimāṃ vā kṛtvā tatra ghoravidyāṃ sādhayanti kākhordavetālānuprayogeṇa jīvitāntarāyaṃ vā śarīravināśaṃ vā kartukāmāḥ |
283:136: yaiḥ punastasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
283:138: sarve ca te parasparaṃ maitracittā hitacittā avyāpannacittāśca viharanti svakasvakena parigraheṇa saṃtuṣṭāḥ ||
283:140: ye cānye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā āryāṣṭāṅgaiḥ samanvāgatā upavāsamupavasanti,
283:141: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traimāsikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
283:142: yeṣāmevaṃpraṇidhānamevamabhiprāyam-anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśi sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau upapadyema yatrāmitāyustathāgataḥ |
283:143: yaiḥ punastasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
283:144: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye aṣṭau bodhisattvā ṛddhyāgatā upadarśayanti,
283:147: teṣāṃ tatropapannānāṃ pūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate,
283:151: te anekāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti |
283:152: apare punaḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu prabhūtadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamṛddheṣu ca kuleṣu upapatsyante |
283:156: yaśca mātṛgrāmaḥ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati,
283:157: tasya sa eva paścimaḥ strībhāvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ ||
283:158: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat-ahaṃ bhagavan paścime kāle paścime samaye teṣāṃ śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrāvayiṣyāmi,
283:160: ye idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
283:164: tat pañcaraṅgikavastraiḥ pariveṣṭya śucau pradeśe sthāpayitavyam |
283:167: anyāni ca anekāni ca devakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi upasaṃkramiṣyanti |
283:169: te ca bhagavan idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ prakāśayiṣyanti |
283:170: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaravibhāgaṃ ca tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
283:177: yaśca mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ,
283:180: śucinā śucimāhāraṃ kṛtvā śucau pradeśe (nānāpuṣpāṇi saṃstārya nānāgandhapradhūpite nānāvastracchatradhvajapatākāsamalaṃkṛte tasmin pṛthivīpradeśe susnātagātreṇa śucivimalavasanadhāriṇā nirmalacittena akaluṣacittena avyāpādacittena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena (upekṣācittena)
283:182: nānātūryasaṃgītipravāditena sā tathāgatapratimā pradakṣiṇīkartavyā tasya tathāgatasya pūrṇapraṇidhānāni manasi kartavyāni |
283:196: yatra vāyasaḥ sthito bhavati durnimittaṃ vā,
283:198: taistasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā |
283:205: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā va kuladuhitaro vā ye yāvajjīvaṃ triśaraṇamupagṛhṇanti,
283:212: ye ca yathāparigṛhītācchisāsaṃvarādanyatarācchikṣāpadāt bhraṣṭā bhavanti saced durgatibhayabhītāḥ,
283:213: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyuḥ,
283:215: yaśca mātṛgrāmaḥ prasavanakāle tīvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati,
283:216: yā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyamanusmaret,
283:223: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma-śraddadhāsi tvamānanda pattīyasi yadahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya guṇān varṇayiṣyāmi ?
283:224: athavā te kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā atra gambhīre buddhagocare ?
283:225: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat-na me bhadanta bhagavan atra kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu |
283:228: imau bhagavan candrasūryau evaṃ maharddhikau evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ prapatetām,
283:231: kiṃ tu bhadanta santi sattvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalāḥ |
283:232: idaṃ buddhagocaraṃ śrutvāṃ evaṃ vakṣyantikathametannāmadheyasmaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya tāvanto guṇānuśaṃsā bhavanti ?
283:235: teṣāṃ dīrgharātramanarthāya na hitāya na sukhāya vinipātāy bhaviṣyati |
283:243: abhūmiratra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvā ekajātipratibaddhān bodhisattvān mahāsattvāniti |
283:247: tasya bhagavatastathāgatasya bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya ānanda bodhisattvacaryāma(ryā a)
283:250: ākāṅkṣamāṇo'haṃ tasya tathāgatasya kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā bodhisattvacārikāyāṃ vistaravibhaṅgaṃ nirdiśeyam |
283:252: na tveva śakyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistarāntamadhigantum ||
283:253: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyāmeva parṣadi trāṇamukto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnipatito'bhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ |
283:254: utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-bhaviṣyanti bhadanta bhagavan sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitā dīrghavyādhinā (kṣīṇagātrāḥ)
283:255: kṣuttarṣābhyāṃ śuṣkakaṇṭhoṣṭhā maraṇābhimukhā rorudyamānebhirmitrajñātisālohitaiḥ parivāritā andhakārāṃ diśaṃ paśyanto yamapuruṣairākarṣyamāṇāśca |
283:256: tasya kalevare mañcaśayite vijñānaṃ yamasya dharmarājasyāgratāmupanīyate |
283:257: yacca tasya sattvasya sahajānubaddhameva yatkiṃcit tena puruṣeṇa kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā kṛtaṃ bhavati,
283:258: tat sarvaṃ sulikhitaṃ kṛtvā yamasya dharmarājasya upanāmyate |
283:260: gaṇayati yathākṛtaṃ cāsya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā tathājñāmājñāpayati |
283:261: tatra ye te mitrajñātisālohitāstasyāturasyārthāya taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhaṃ tathāgataṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccheyuḥ,
283:263: sthānametadvidyate yat tasya tadvijñānaṃ punarapi pratinivarteta,
283:265: yadi vā saptame divase yadi vā (ekaviṃśatime)
283:266: divase yadi vā pañcatriṃśatime divase yadi vā ekonapañcāśatime divase tasya vijñānaṃ punarapi nivarteta,
283:268: tasya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā karmavipākaṃ svayameva pratyakṣaṃ bhavati |
283:269: jñātvā sa jīvitahetau na kadāpi pāpamakuśalaṃ karma kariṣyati |
283:270: tasmācchrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā ||
283:271: athāyuṣmānānandastrāṇamuktaṃ nāma bodhisattvametadavocat-kathaṃ kulaputra tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya pūjā kartavyā ?
283:272: trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha-ye bhadanta ānanda mahato vyādhitaḥ parimocitukāmāḥ,
283:274: bhikṣusaṃghasya ca āhārapānaiḥ sarvopakaraṇairyathāśakti pūjopasthānaṃ kartavyam |
283:275: bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ triṣkṛtvā rātryāṃ triṣkṛtvā divase manasi kartavyam |
283:279: ekaikayā pratimayā sapta sapta dīpāḥ prajvālayitavyāḥ |
283:281: yadi ekonacatvāriṃśatime divase āloko na kṣīyate,
283:284: punaraparaṃ bhadanta ānanda yeṣāṃ rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāmupadravā vā upasargā vā pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ,
283:285: vyādhipīḍā vā svacakrapīḍā vā paracakrapīḍā vā nakṣatrapīḍā vā candragrahasūryagrahapīḍā vā akālavātavṛṣṭipīḍā vā avagrahapīḍā vā samutthitā,
283:286: amāṅgalyā vā saṃkrāmakavyādhirvā vipad vā samupasthitā,
283:287: tena rājñā kṣatriyeṇa mūrdhābhiṣiktena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena bhavitavyam,
283:289: tasya ca bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya yathāpūrvoktapūjā karaṇīyā |
283:290: tadā tasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya etena kuśalamūlena ca tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistareṇa tatra viṣaye kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati subhikṣam |
283:292: sarve ca viṣayanivāsinaḥ sattvā ārogāḥ sukhitāḥ pramodyabahulāḥ |
283:293: na ca tatra viṣaye duṣṭayakṣarākṣasabhūtapiśācāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhayanti |
283:297: trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha-nanu tvayā bhadanta ānanda tathāgatasyāntikācchrutam-santi akālamaraṇāni |
283:307: pañcamaṃ cākālamaraṇaṃ ye ca udakena mriyante |
283:312: navamamakālamaraṇaṃ ye kṣuttṛṣopahatā āhārapānamalabhamānā ārtāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti |
283:315: atha khalu tatra parṣadi dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ saṃnipatitā abhūvan yaduta kiṃbhīro nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ,
283:327: ete dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ ekaikānucaraparivāritā ekakaṇṭhena bhagavantamevamāhuḥ-śrutamasmābhiśra bhagavatā buddhānubhāvena tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam |
283:329: te vayaṃ sahitāḥ samagrā yāvajjīvaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ ,
283:333: yo viśeṣeṇa grāme vā nagare vā janapade vā araṇyāyatene vā edaṃ sūtraṃ pracārayiṣyati,
283:334: yo vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyati,
283:340: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ yakṣasenāpatīnāṃ sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ,
283:341: yad yūyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya kṛtajñatāmanusmaramāṇānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitāya pratipannāḥ ||
283:344: bhagavānāha-tena hi ānanda dharmaparyāyamidaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaramiti dhāraya,
